original_title: Trains delayed on main line and Chilaw line due to breakdowns
original_body_lines: Train services on the main line and the Chilaw line have been delayed due to two trains breaking down, the Railway Department said.
A train travelling from Polgahawela to Colombo Fort has suffered a breakdown at the Ambepussa train station while another train has broken down on the Chilaw line, it said.
